Although the Mayor and City Council do not maintain offices in the City Hall, any Council member can be reached by contacting City Hall at:  
  
30 S. Holland  
Bellville, Texas 77418  
979-865-3136  
Fax-979-865-9485  
  
If you would like to address the Council there is a “Citizen’s Forum” item on each agenda. If you would like to request any action by the Council, please contact City Hall and fill out a request form to be placed on the agenda for a specific meeting.

City of Bellville  |  30 South Holland St.  |  Bellville, TX 77418  |  Phone: 979-865-3136  |  Fax: 979-865-9485
